channel.title: Find or make tutorial? Heal timers
channel.description: Hi im using allstars 317 and i'm not very good at codeing but ive tried many times before its been about a year and im giving it another try. This is why im using a premade 317 so i can change everything but i dont have to necesarily "code" much which is good for me so... any ways one of the few things i want is to add heal timers and i cant figure out how so if any one could help out with tutorials OR TEAMVIEW WOULD BE FUCKING AWESOME ( you do it on my comp) you'd help a lot thanks. Also i need to to get wcing timers u can mass trees lol

thanks a lot for the help but espicially since i dont have that its not like im changing it im going to need more descriptiveness on how to put it in im really bad at this stuff

Declare.

if (variable = int) { doAction(); } else { doOtherAction(); }
If statement.
